preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry container, measure 22.5 g of Arsenic Trioxide.  
 2. Add 45 g of Iron(III) Oxide to the container.  
 3. Include 30 g of Zinc Oxide in the mixture.  
 4. Slowly add 50 g of distilled water while stirring continuously to ensure a homogenous mixture.  
 5. Stir until a thick paste is formed.
